website_summaries.verdict: Made of cotton, foam, and polyester, this fold-up bed has nothing to inflate, so there's no risk of leaks. What's more, the pad is washable.
pros: Foam-padded center with cushioned outer bumpers can be removed for machine washing
Bumper keeps toddler in place at night
cons: Crib sheets are recommended by manufacturer but fit awkwardly
Good for car travel but too large and awkward for air travel

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: We were too scared to get an inflatable bed for my very active toddler, and we've been very happy with this bed. The biggest problem is its very difficult to wash bc you have to remove all the foam, and if you don't put a waterproof mattress cover around the foam pad you will run into trouble with stinky foam. It basically rolls into a large duffle bag, so may be difficult for plane travel but fine for car travel.
customer_reviews.author: Menke

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed - very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: We and our toddler love this bed. I love that it can keep him mostly contained, since he's a roller and flopper when he sleeps. He has, though, ended up half in and half out, and there was a night when he ended up fully outside of the bed and woke up disoriented. But, for most nights it has worked great. He loves his new special travel bed! It is surprisingly light to carry. Easy to get into its bag, and love that it can be folded into a couch.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLazz

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bed for my son on our road trips and he was really excited to have his “travel bed”. He loved it, he’s 3 and it fit him great. It’s not that easy to take cover off to clean by not impossible either and I’m just happy to be able to wash it. I like it has a bag to carry as it is a little bug and clunky to pack, but it’s also really soft and his own spot so I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this travel bed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this travel bed. It's not the smallest, but it's very comfortable, soft, and not heavy at all. We spend a week at our friends, and my 14 months old son loved sleeping in it. I am glad I decided to go with memory foam instead of air-mattress. This one is soft, warm, and you very easy to handle. I look forward to traveling more with it, as I don't worry where my LO will be sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Olha

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought. I use this as my toddlers bed. I sometimes sleep with him and find it really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Airka

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and bulky
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is a good size for our 2-yr-old daughter, but it doesn't pack up as small as I had hoped in order to travel overseas with it. Also, the foam mattress in the middle in very thin and not very comfortable. The zipper used to close the bed into its carry-case is not very strong and has already torn away from the fabric after only one use. I *really* wanted to like this product, but am just not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O.

customer_reviews.title: Handy nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is thick for my Son (2yo) but for me it is too thin(bcuase he love when I snuggle with him there) , he is using it Until now , it is really good and handy for the kid who like nap everywhere and who hate the crip .
customer_reviews.author: Ancilla Casconi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my 8month old it’s perfect soft material and the little mattress on the bottom is foamy which makes it very comfortable for the baby
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Inspect seams.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. Cover is coming apart and is not a fixable seam. It’s as if it wasn’t even sewn. Didn’t notice until I went to wash cover. Only slept in one night by my 3yr old grandson. Would change my review to a 5 star if the cover would be replaced. Great concept.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  A Spampinato

customer_reviews.title: A dog bed would have been cheaper and better
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our daughter was too big for a pack and play but can't go in a bed. We should have bought a dog bed from Costco for $30. Very similar quality.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: We use this every time we travel. This bed is very easy to clean and very easy to store away when not needed. Your child won't roll out of it and it's big enough that they'll have space to still move around in their sleep. It is rather bulky so just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect. I'm so excited to have run into this product. I've been looking for a travel bed that's not air mattress for quite some time as my 20-month-old daughter is used to sleeping in a crib and not just anywhere on a blanket or something. She also likes sitting here and just play. It's good quality and easily folds and fits into its travel bag. I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old sleeps great in this when we travel. It's easy to wash in the washing machine after each trip we take and reassembly is complete in ~3 minutes after each wash. The carrying case helps keep it clean, too, when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! So does my 2 year old grandson. Sleeps through the night - not much more to say except priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: NancyVee

customer_reviews.title: Good portable kid bed
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes having his own bed when he visits. It wirhs great for this 2 1/2 year old kid.
customer_reviews.author: Island Boy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little travel bed.
customer_reviews.text: This little travel bed is perfect for my almost 3 year old grandson. We take it with us whenever we travel and he loves sleeping in it. It’s lightweight, well padded, and folds up to an easily portable size. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose this travel bed
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this travel bed. It folds up and goes fairly easily back into its bag. For traveling it might be abit bulky to carry around. I use it for my granddaughter when she stays the night. She loves it and sleeps right through the night. I had done a lot of research on travel beds for toddlers, and am very happy I made this choice
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for toddler
customer_reviews.text: This bed is just perfect for my 2 1/2 year old grandson to sleep in at my house. I just roll it out and then roll it up when he leaves
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mader

customer_reviews.title: Great napping bed for my 20 month old grandson
customer_reviews.text: It has worked out perfectly. I needed a place for my 20 month old grandson to nap when he visits me every Saturday. The sides keep him for rolling off the base and I think makes him feel secure. He also will sit in the "napping bed" and play with his toys and look through his books. When the bed is not in use, I just fold it over and store it away. I am happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: My 21/2 year old granddaughter loves this bed, she ...
customer_reviews.text: My 21/2 year old granddaughter loves this bed, she sleeps through the night when she has a sleepover with us. Not always the case at home.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Banyon

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Product works alright as a toddler bed, but is ridiculously difficult to clean and more importantly roll up for travel. Unless you have to have one that doesn't blow up... I'd recommend something else. Also by itself it doesn't have much cushioning. I'd recommend buying a memory foam cushion to put under it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Olexa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. He naps in it and we take it with us when we leave town! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: Debated the options for a travel toddler bed. Blow up or not? I'm glad I didn't. This packs a bit big, but super comfortable. I did add an extra layer of foam on the bottom, but it was not really bad before.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves it especially when we fold it in half and it makes a little couch for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nishimoto

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but crib fitted sheets don't work for it
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel n travel bag and non inflated but theres no way to put crib fitted sheet on it cause center pad is sewn in through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for when our son visits his grandparents house. It is generous in size and the rounded bumper around the bed keeps the child from rolling off. Great invention and idea! Also, comes w/ a zipper bag for folding the item up for storing/traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 2 year to sleep in on the floor beside our bed when we travel and stay with family and friends. She loves it and sleeps very well which means everyone is happy (especially this mommy who needs her sleep)!
customer_reviews.author: GJ114524

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this "camp bed" for our granddaughter sleep overs and camping. It's comfortable, safe with the bumpers, and folds up with its own travel bag. I thought it was expensive, but it is well made and seems to be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this, our baby loves this, its great and comfy! it is big maybe a little bigger than a silky sleeping bag rolled up, but its totally worth it and totally can travel with it! completely washable too. foam pad. worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, portable, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16mo old grandson I babysit. He loves it for sleep and also when you fold it in half as a chair!! Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 1. 5 year old was able to roll ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old was able to roll off of it. The sides are too flat
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Safe bed for Grandsons!
customer_reviews.text: This is my grand babies bed at Grandmas house! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Townsend

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased this item for my two year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item for my two year old granddaughter's first alone stay at Gran & Pop's. She slept in it for two weeks without any problems. She slept through the night and didn't get out until we got her up in the morning. Thinking of buying another one for when both grandchildren visit.
customer_reviews.author: Cathycv1

customer_reviews.title: Great travel and lounging bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a long weekend in a hotel so that my son has his own room and own space. He absolutely loves this bed (he is 2.5 years). It doesn't seem comfortable (with enough padding on the bottom) but for a little guy it must be okay because he has slept in this on several occasions. We have brought it downstairs in our house, too, on the occasions when he doesn't want to go to bed in his room for nap time but still needs the rest. He will happily climb into his special bed and snooze.
customer_reviews.author: NCondor

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a travel bed for our toddler, since hotel cribs and Pack N Play's are either too small or tend to sag. No adjustment difficulties as all. It actually functions well to help with the transition from crib to a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aftab

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gramma & Gramps' house
customer_reviews.text: Got these once my boys outgrew their pack n plays for traveling. Now the toddler twins love "camping" over at Gramma and Gramps' house in their special big boy beds.
customer_reviews.author: Jill C

customer_reviews.title: Good size toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a really great size, nearly the size of a crib mattress and is portable. I wish it folded up more easily to be transported in the carry bag. I also found it to be a little over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Romer

customer_reviews.title: other than that it's great and my daughter slept very well on it
customer_reviews.text: It has some cushion on the bottom but not so much, so I put a folded blanket underneath, other than that it's great and my daughter slept very well on it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DGL

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son loves it. Tall 3 yo and fits well. Only downside is the chemical smell. Hard to get rid of even with washing. But overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Giordano

customer_reviews.title: It has a great take along bag also
customer_reviews.text: Large and comfy. It has a great take along bag also.
customer_reviews.author: Connie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter for her naps and when we travel. It’s very compact when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Our granddaughter can finally sleep somewhere other than her crib.
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter can finally sleep somewhere other than her crib. We love it. Very easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Chubacka

customer_reviews.title: Still great after 5 years!
customer_reviews.text: We are still using this bed 5 years later with child 2. This bed is fantastic! Easy to wash and comfortable for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter's been using it for months, and she loves it. It's more expensive than the rest, but you only need to buy it once. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trang

customer_reviews.title: Durable construction
customer_reviews.text: The overall construction seem to be pretty good. It is rather large when rolled up for storage. Would like to see larger bumpers and a water resistant storage bag for the bed. Otherwise it comes apart for cleaning rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 yr old grandson when he spends the night and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon cust Jax FL

customer_reviews.title: This is great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This is great to travel with. Our toddler fits it in perfectly, and if me or my husband needed to curl up with him for some reason, we could fit too! It does not fold up small, and a bit bulky, but good quality. I would rather have this than something inflatable in case it popped.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made. Life is so much easier on the road. My son treats this bed like he treats his own at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and was easy to wash and store for my visiting 2 y/o granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a very lightweight duffal bag. My 2 year old immediately wanted to lie on it, and he slept very well when we took it to a friends house for nap time. The padding is soft, the size is perfect! I've hear complaints about how to clean it, but we only used it once and have not figured that out. I like that it's like a bed. My husband calls it a doggy bed, ha ha! I have used if for car travel, but it is quite bulky to be taken an an airplane for travel involving flights where this will take a large amout of cargo space.
customer_reviews.author: JanetteL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 20 month old
customer_reviews.text: My now 20 month old had never slept in a "big girl bed" before we bought this about two months ago. She was getting too big for the pack n play and we needed an alternative for traveling. The day this arrived, she immediately went to lie in it and slept in it without getting up through the night. She loves this bed. We have since traveled to Arizona, and she slept in it without any complaints for 4 nights straight. We checked the duffelbag it comes with and it's light enough for it's relatively big size to haul around without much hassle. By far the best purchase we have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: I also like the cushion material
customer_reviews.text: It's really safe for kids. My 13-month son is very active when he sleeps. This helped me a lot to keep him in a safe position while we were on a trip. The carrying bag is also so handy when you travel. I also like the cushion material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 years old loves it. She has been sleeping in it for over 1 month and will be sleeping in it for another month during our trip. It's a simple bed but it does the job. I took the foam out and added crib mattress protector and crib sheet on it to make it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Ein Yong

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves this bed for overnight travel when staying in a hotel! It's cozy and soft; just add a pillow and small comforter for a great night's rest! We questioned the price at first, but it's totally worth it! Our granddaughter is 3 1/2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Tuohy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed , but I do add quilt under for padding but it is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Deppiesse

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it !
customer_reviews.text: This travel bed is awesome. My daughter is 2 and uses this at her grandparents and whenever we travel anywhere. She loves it so much she plays with it at home. It's very easy to roll up and put in the bag. I even fit her blanket and a few stuffed animals in there also.
customer_reviews.author: jburdo7

customer_reviews.title: This bed is amazing! My daughter is 20 months old and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! My daughter is 20 months old and we do a lot of traveling. It fits perfect in hotel rooms. It is a little bulky, but worth carrying around. She loves it so much she pulls it out at nap time at home! Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jamilyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old slept wonderfully in this little bed on vacation - all night! Totally worth the money - cozy, secure, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my granddaughter, she doesn't roll out of it
customer_reviews.author: R.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to a small space. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina R Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old to use at my house for overnight visits, or nap time. Well made, just right on size and cushioning. It is light weight, and easy to put back in zipper case. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: My son liked this bed too much!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this...but now he won't sleep in a regular bed very often. He wants this snuggle bed. Guess it reminds him of the moses basket he loved when he was a baby and wanted to sleep in it all the time. It's cute, and with those fun messy toddler ways, I have to take it apart, and wash it a lot. At least once a week. I dry it on the line, and put it all back together. It's a little more work, but it's his favorite place to cuddle up.
customer_reviews.author: Booked29

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Went to hilton head and bought this for the trip so my 18 month old could sleep in it. She slept fine the entire trip so it did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Pagani Zonda

customer_reviews.title: Great for napping or reading corner
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our little one's reading corner. She has a comfortable place to call her own and if she drifts off to sleep while in there, she's in an area that's soft and protected from rolling over on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's a great travel bed
customer_reviews.text: It's a great travel bed, light and comfortable. My only complaint is that you can't seem to be able to put a fitted sheet on it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! My girl loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My girl loves it! She uses it every day since it came to play and nap in! Excellent quality, a little bulky to travel with but no worse than a pack and play, only a lot lighter! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality control
customer_reviews.text: The product had not been properly quality controlled as it arrived with loose seams between the bottom and the side pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good at Grandmas too
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves this and so does her Mom....Good at Grandmas too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what I bought it for! I wish there was a better way to store it is why I did not give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Flick

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I babysit my Grandaughter once a week. The pack n play was so big & couldn't break it down easily. Also she was outgrowing it (2yrs). Not only is this more comfortable for her, but it also rolls up & can be put in a closet. I have recommended it to all my grandma friends. My daughter went camping & used it, it comes in a case with handles, so u can take it on planes. The ONLY down side is its kind of pricey
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Motley

customer_reviews.title: looks cute folds up nice not functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip with my 2 year old. It is cute and pretty convenient but the sides of the bed look much larger in the picture than they actually are. She ended up rolling out every night. It also doesn't have substantial padding and is pretty uncomfortable when placed on a hard wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bed! Our son who recently outgrew our pack n play loves it. Very comfortable and portable
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Coons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Our two year old sleeps great when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Segrest

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler travel bed I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2.5 year old. She loves this bed! And so do I because I know she will be safe at night sleeping in it. It is a little bulky, but if you can get beyond that or have the trunk space, it is a great item. Most toddler travel beds are just smaller portable air mattresses which make quite a bit of noise. My little one moves a lot during the night. We tried several other travel beds before finally finding this one. No noise, no set up, no rolling onto the hard floor - it's simply excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young grandson for spending the night. He loves it but he does roll over the bumpers at night. I like the convenience of just popping in out of the storage bag and it's ready without any setup. The only inconvenience is when it needs to be washed. All the bumpers and foam pad have to be removed which is not a simple task. Overall though it's the best I could for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. My daughter slept great in it and after reading some other reviews I put a few blankets under to add a bit of padding under a make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kinnear

customer_reviews.title: The verdict is still out
customer_reviews.text: We have used it once. It is hard to roll up and stuff back in the bag. I put a thick blanket underneath it to provide a little more cushion. You will need to put some kind of waterproof cover on it. I bought the Carter's "easy fit jersey crib sheet" and the "keep me dry waterproof crib pad" and THEY WILL NOT FIT IT. I'm still working on the best idea for keeping it dry in case of an accident. Our granddaughter will be spending the next 3 nights with us (she is 18 months), I'm interested to see how it does this time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and sets up fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport and sets up fast! My 2 year old slept all night at grandmas in this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great little bed!
customer_reviews.text: We got this travel bed for our 4 year old daughter and it's so awesome! You don't have to blow it up, and it's much more comfortable than a blow up bed anyway. It folds into a nice little chair and she actually used that to watch TV in while we were on vacation. I highly recommend this bed. It's an easy way to make sure your child has a good sleep when you're traveling away from home.
customer_reviews.author: K. Karns

customer_reviews.title: My child LOVES it- me, not so much
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and half year old LOVES this. He WANTS to go take a nap in it. There is enough room for me to lay on it with him and read books BUT it is a pain to get back in the travel bag and having to find a paperclip to unzip it is annoying too. It is very light weight which is nice, but quite bulky. Honestly, I think it is overpriced for what is essentially a dog bed. BUT my child loves it and if he is happy to go to bed, then I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: L Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3yo grandson to have somewhere to sleep when he stays overnight. We live in an apartment so wanted something we could fold up out of the way, and this has been perfect for him. Especially since it becomes a comfy wee couch for him to watch movies or rest during the day as well. The mattress is a little thin and we use additional bedding to add to the comfort level, but it's better than anything we were able to find locally (in New Zealand) and it was delivered so quickly as well. As an every-now-and-then bed, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shar Carlini

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: This travel bed was exactly what we needed for our 2 1/2 yr old grandson, not only when he came to visit but also for a Hawaiian trip with the family. He was very comfortable and it was very light and easily packable in its carry bag. We checked it as baggage. The absence of toxic materials (plastic chemicals, etc.) was important.
customer_reviews.author: LDB

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! Exactly what I was searching for. My toddler refused to sleep anywhere but her crib and was so excited to sleep in this bed. It's pretty roomy so will def get a good use out of it. It's the only bed of its kind where the child is not sleeping on a blow up mattress. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Glikman

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter absolutely loves this little bed. We use it when she sleeps over but she also loves to sit in it and play with her toys. My only issue is that when I washed it it was hard to get the foam back in - but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move but the mattress pad is a bit thin and unable to fit sheet or protector onto the mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport but could not put on the recommended mattress protector (or any sheets) on the bedpad since it is totally enclosed in the covering. Agree that it is overpriced but it did the trick for what we needed. 2 year-old granddaughter seemed comfortable wth it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable bed for when my grandson comes to visit, he's to big for a baby co-sleeper and I didn't want to buy a wooden toddler bed. He slept very well and loved this bed. It's great that I can fold it up in the duffle bag and store it in my spare bedroom closet.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: We have been in the process of moving for the last couple of weeks and so my son has had a lot of occasion to use this at Grandma's house and in hotels. He loves it, and therefore, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: kimber79

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about my daughter sleeping in this for traveling since she is used to a crib or pack-n-play. However, she thought it was great! Surprisingly she stayed in it and slept just fine! Perfect size for a 2 year old. Not sure if it could be used for a child older than 4 or a tall child. Carrying bag is nice for packing/traveling. Still bulky, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Travel bed... sort of
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes her bed; it would be perfect for a road trip but flying with it will cost you at least $25 each way. The bed alone takes up a large suitcase. It comes with a travel bag but I would think the airlines would just take it as a challenge to rip it which is why we placed it in a suitcase. The price is a little steep but worth it to keep a toddler happy while away from her bed. For size my son is about 45" and could sleep in the bed if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Great except for zipper pull
customer_reviews.text: For saftey neither the zipper on the bed or on the carry bag has a pull. The bed you can understand but the carry bag is troublesome. A paper clip treaded into the zipper works until you forget to bring one when traveling. My 3-year old granddaughter LOVES this bed. It is great that is does not need to be blown up and when it folds in half it takes up less room and can be used as a seat. Great purchase and I'd highly recommend this product. The company should design a removable zipper pull.
customer_reviews.author: Registered Dietitian

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little spot for my 2 year old to nap ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little spot for my 2 year old to nap at grandmas.... But certainly not worth the 250$ I paid for it (with exchange) WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. Here are the problems. Can't put sheets around the pad. The pad is not very thick. It is designed to only open with a paper clip, which can be difficult to find in a hotel room if you forget to bring one. Too expensive for what you get or for what you dont get.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. Shetler

customer_reviews.title: Handle on Bag
customer_reviews.text: Has not been used yet so can not rate on use. That being said the handle tore loose from the bag carrier when I picked it up for the first time. i hope the actual bed is sewn better than the handle.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Leachco bumpzzz bed
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today Shipping on it was super fast which is great I was worried it would not make it here on time for a camping trip. It is really a great bed my son even took a nap in it and must of been pretty comfy because he slept for 2 hours. It is a little bigger then I anticipated but thats ok I can see him getting a lot of use out of it. The zipper thing that a lot of the other reviews is a little bit of a pain but it is manageable.
customer_reviews.author: LJL

customer_reviews.title: practical bedding, disappointing craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and practical toddler bedding, but after three weeks of use, the zipper broke. can no longer travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Israel K.

customer_reviews.title: leachco bumpzzz
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bed today and the quality of the product is disappointing that I feel like it's way way overpriced and how do you wash it? Put the whole thing in the washer/dryer? I wonder if they even tried to wash it themselves. I'm afraid if you keep washing it (because it looks like you would have too because of the cloth covering) that it would ruin the foam fast. As soon as my toddlers stepped in it, it got dirty and the cloth is not one of those you can wipe off easily. Honestly, the price should have been half what it is now. The design is good though that's the only thing I like.
customer_reviews.author: shy_7930

customer_reviews.title: Good bed. Our 2 year old sleeps soundly on ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bed. Our 2 year old sleeps soundly on it when we travel. Easy to deploy and easy to return to its case.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product and service
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a good fit for our very BIG toddler but we loved it! very well made and comfy. Had NO problems with the return process, which is a BONUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa Lindenmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for a 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: While this Leahco bed is very well made. It is so small that my 4 year old toddler was too long to even fit in it. I think the dimensions for the bed are from outside the bumpers rather than inside. It's too bad because she was really looking forward to sleeping in it but we returned it within 48 hours of opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi&Ketan Ram

product_meta.title: Leachco BumpZZZ Travel Bed, Brown/Green Forest Frolics
product_meta.description: Color:Green Forest FrolicsThe BumpZZZ can go anywhere your child goes, and it's ready to comfort with cushioned support all around when he/she needs a soft spot to play, read, lounge, or catch some ZZZ's. The BumpZZZ Travel Bed is made of firm, cushioned side bumpers and a padded bottom for all-around cozy comfort. It's generously sized, so it makes a great sleeping or lounging spot for children ages 3 years and up. It's so versatile. Use the BumpZZZ fully extended or doubled up for a stackable lounge cushion. The center foam pad and outer bumper padding are easily removable for laundering, and it's lightweight and folds into it's own matching storage bag. BumpZZZ is the perfect travel bed for nighttime away from home, napping, lounging, reading, playtime, or any time your child needs a soft spot to land. Entire Bed Assembled Size: 58 in x 39 in x 7 in, Bag Only Size: 29.5 in x 40 in x .5 in, Bed in Bag Measurements: 20 in x 37 in x 14.75 in, Bed Pad Only Measurements: 43 in x 22 in x 1.25 in
feature_bullets: Perfect for bedtime away from home, napping, lounging, playtime, and more for children ages 3 years and up
Generously sized yet lightweight and folds compactly into included storage bag for easy transport
Foam padded center and cushioned outer bumpers for all around comfort
Nothing to inflate so it's always ready...no extra equipment is ever needed
Use fully extended or folded over for a lounge chair
Zippered removable cover is machine washable
